summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Brandon Street from 25th Avenue South to 32nd Avenue South; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18034 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
